Description of incident: "WHAT HAPPENED.  We discovered malicious code on [merchant website]. The code was designed to allow fraudsters to obtain customer payment information. We immediately began investigating the issue, analyzed [merchant website], removed the malicious code and performed security testing.   WHAT INFORMATION WAS INVOLVED.  Based on our investigation, we believe the fraudster may have accessed your name, address, phone number, email address, payment card number, expiration date, and CVV for any transactions you made on [merchant website] between [variable dates between April 10, 2017 and June 7, 2017]."
